channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats’ Sudden Obsession With Jeffrey Epstein Is An Opportunistic Ploy To Bash Trump
item.description: There's no damning link between Trump and Jeffrey Epstein, but Democrats have decided to weaponize a serious investigation for political gain.

item.title: The Smoking Gun of The Naked Gun
item.description: Even silly distraction is a form of repression.

item.title: Conservative Groups Work Overtime To Hold Congress In 2026 Midterms
item.description: An EAC report shows huge spikes in early in-person voting in swing states; ballot chasers want to keep that momentum growing into the midterms and bey...

item.title: The Atomic Bombing of Japan Was Justified
item.description: The moral indictment of the bombings works from a grossly upside-down portrait of the number and identity of the war’s victims.

item.title: FBI Never Investigated Evidence For Obama AG’s Role In Clinton Email Coverup
item.description: We now have plausible intelligence suggesting the attorney general may have assured Clinton allies that the FBI investigation into Hillary’s emails wo...

item.title: Pushing the Boundaries of Space Commerce
item.description: ‘Space’ is no longer just about science and exploration. It also now offers a serious business opportunity.

item.title: GOP Girlbosses Who Claim To ‘Have It All’ Are Buying The Same Old Feminist Lie
item.description: Fulfillment does not come from doing everything. It comes from doing the right things with devotion, sacrifice, and love.

item.title: Newsom vs. the Terminator
item.description: Former California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger is ready to put some muscle into the effort to stop Newsom’s gerrymander plan.

item.title: Why Raining Justice On The Russia Hoaxers Is So Tricky — And So Important
item.description: Absent justice for the Russia hoax, the lesson to the conspirators is that they should go even bigger next time.

item.title: The American Eagle Saga Only Shows the Woke Left Is Out of Touch
item.description: Hot is no longer toxic, and the normies are back.

item.title: Texas Republicans give Democrats until Friday to return to the Legislature or lose their seats

item.title: Former Biden aide Bruce Reed said there was no need for 'any concerns' over Biden's mental fitness

item.title: Trump gives Vance nod for MAGA heir in 2028
item.description: President Trump said Tuesday that Vice President J.D. Vance is the "most likely" heir to the MAGA movement and likely the Republican 2028 nominee.
